info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 12:56AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phillips, northwestern Daniels and northern Valley Counties through 200 AM MDT... At 1255 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles north of Hinsdale, or 29 miles southwest of Opheim, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opheim, Richland, Saco, Hinsdale, Port Of Opheim, Vandalia, Thoeny, Frenchman Reservoir, Baylor and Glentana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
